propose.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a multi -grained attention network to address the above two issues in aspect level sentiment classification .

fine - grained attention mechanism.from sentence: Specifically , we propose a fine - grained attention mechanism ( i.e. F- Aspect2Context and F - Context2Aspect ) , which is employed to characterize the word - level interactions between aspect and context words , and relieve the information loss occurred in coarse - grained attention mechanism .

bidirectional coarsegrained attention.from sentence: In addition , we utilize the bidirectional coarsegrained attention ( i.e. C- Aspect2Context and C - Context2Aspect ) and combine them with finegrained attention vectors to compose the multigrained attention network for the final sentiment polarity prediction , which can leverage the advantages of them .

valuable aspect - level interaction info.from sentence: More importantly , in order to make use of the valuable aspect - level interaction information , we design an aspect alignment loss in the objective function to enhance the difference of the attention weights towards the aspects which have the same context and different sentiment polarities .
